plot: Ordinary boy Meisaku Matsuda enrolled Ryūgū Elementary School, a school famous for producing fabled characters, with a hope of becoming fabled himself one day. Soon he found himself surrounded by a group of eccentric -- if not outright weird -- classmates.
ending_theme: "Ahare! Warera ga Sekai no Chūshin" (あはれ！我らが世界の中心) by Dempagumi.inc
